entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 08:19 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
